code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums1
# @param {Integer[]} nums2
# @return {Integer}
def min_operations(nums1, nums2)
  n = nums1.length
  swap_needed1 = swap_needed2 = 0

  # Check if nums1[n-1] is already the max in nums1
  max1 = nums1.max
  swap_needed1 += 1 if nums1[n-1] != max1 && nums2[n-1] == max1

  # Check if nums2[n-1] is already the max in nums2
  max2 = nums2.max
  swap_needed2 += 1 if nums2[n-1] != max2 && nums1[n-1] == max2

  if nums1[n-1] != max1 && nums2[n-1] != max2
    if nums1[n-1] < max2 && nums2[n-1] < max1
      return 1 # Swap the last elements to satisfy both conditions
    else
      return -1 # Impossible to satisfy both conditions
    end
  end

  # No swaps needed if both are already in their correct positions
  [swap_needed1, swap_needed2].max
end
